summary: Notifies sender she reached the wrong Ryan; US-based recipient isn't the intended candidate.
context: Reply to Rubicon Recruitment email likely intended for a UK-based person with the same name.
text:
Hey Beth, apologies but we haven't spoken... I think you may have sent an email to the wrong address (I'm US based but sometimes get messages destined for my UK analog).

Best,
A "Ryan Rodd" in the US.
